programme.desc: Four ballpark chefs try to hit a culinary home run. Guy Fieri spins the food wheels to determine what two stadium classics the chefs must combine.

programme.desc: The hosts are putting delicious grown-up spins on childhood favourites. They include mortadella and fig pizza bagel and Philly cheesesteak sloppy Joe!

programme.desc: The chefs put their sea urchin knowledge to the test in the appetiser round. Then, a corn cake meets a classic candy in the dessert basket.
